item.title: ENL1

item.title: HvHK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU7Hr1G030040 Gene Symbol: HvHK1 Gene Name: HISTIDINE KINASE 1 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: HvHK1 encodes a histidine kinase and is specifically expressed in the syncytial endosperm at the maternal–filial boundary.
